dcterms:creator: Yann LeCun
Leon Bottou
Yoshua Bengio
Patrick Haffner
dcterms:description: A benchmark image classification dataset consisting of a training set of 60000 and a test set of 10000 28 × 28 gray-scale images representing digits ranging from 0 to 9. The model must be unaware of the image structure, meaning CNNs are forbidden.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Karen Simonyan
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: A benchmark image classification dataset consisting of a training set of 50000 and a test set of 10000 32 × 32 color images representing 10 classes: airplanes, automobiles, birds, cats, deers, dogs, frogs, horses, ships, and trucks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: A benchmark image classification dataset consisting of a training set of 604K and a test set of 26K 32 × 32 color images representing digits ranging from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: SVHN
